categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Matt Sloan is an Australian ex special effects and animatronics technician who portrayed Plo Koon in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones and Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. He also worked as an animatronics technician in those films.
